Sorting Objects based on Color and Size
Documentation

1

GROUP 4:

Arpita Agrawal (09307935)
Ruttika Maheshwari (09307045)
Sukanya Basu (09305908)


Basic Algorithm:


1. The robot covers the field, bounded by white strips, according to a particular algorithm.

2. Whenever it detects an object, it aligns itself to face it and takes a picture.

3. This image is processed in matlab and accordingly the instruction is sent to the robot.

4. The robot ignores the object if it is not of the chosen color.

5. Otherwise it picks the object up and places in the respective container depending on its size.
